title: Grandia II Anniversary Edition
notes: Couldn't get the game to run in fullscreen, but windowed mode worked without any hiccups. Couldn't get game configuration tool to run, either.

Config tool doesn't work (needs .Net) but doesn't seem necessary to run the game.   The .INI file in (game)/config/ is easy to edit.  I suggest turning "useAnalogTriggerRotation" OFF.  Using the analog triggers on my 360 pad made it continuously rotate.  Aside from those minor issues, runs perfectly.
title: Grandia® II Anniversary Edition

notes: Config-Launcher wont start, but in Grandia2_settings.ini you can edit your resolution (1920x1080) and aspectratio (16:9), But remember it's a 4:3 game, so in 16:9 everything is stretched! Steamcloud savegames works fine.
title: Grandia® II Anniversary Edition

notes: As said below, can't run the configuration tool, you have to modify the config file manually.
title: Grandia® II Anniversary Edition
